mapper.insert: insert into alarm(specifictask_no, alarm_sender, alarm_receiver, alarm_cont, alarm_date, alarm_read) values(#{specifictask_no},#{alarm_sender},#{alarm_receiver}, #{alarm_cont}, #{alarm_date}, '1')
mapper.select: select * from alarm where alarm_receiver=#{alarm_receiver} order by alarm_read desc, ALARM_NO desc;
select count(alarm_receiver) from alarm where alarm_receiver=#{alarm_receiver} and ALARM_READ='1';
mapper.update: update alarm set alarm_read='0' where alarm_no=#{alarm_no};
